habits.title: Name
habits.name: Habit Name
habits.want_to_become_tooltip: In this field, you can specify who you want to become thanks to this habit. This field is optional, but it is very useful for motivation
habits.stake_tooltip: The bet is the amount you will lose if you don't follow the habit. It will be distributed among friends in proportion to their bets.
habits.auto_habit_tooltip: The auto habit is automatically marked as completed on the selected days of the week
habits.days_tooltip: Select the days of the week when you plan to practice this habit. You can select individual days or click 'All' to select all days of the week.
habits.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the habit?
habits.no_habits: You don't have any habits yet
habits.no_followers: This habit has no followers yet
habits.unfollow_user: Are you sure you want to unfollow @{username}?
habits.unfollow_success: You have successfully unfollowed the user
habits.link_success: You have successfully linked the habit
habits.ping_sent_message: Reminder has been sent to @{username}. They will be notified soon.
habits.confirm_ping_text: Do you want to send a reminder to @{username}?
habits.no_followers_to_ping: No followers to send reminders to
habits.ping_all_sent_message: Reminders have been sent to {count} followers
habits.complete_before_ping: Complete the habit first to send reminders
habits.no_one_following_me_yet: No one is following you yet

join_habit.0: I've been doing this habit for

link.title: Select a habit
link.description: Select one of your habits to link it to the habit you were shared with. Or create a new habit

errors.create: Failed to create habit. Please try again.
errors.delete_forbidden: Only the creator can delete the habit
errors.edit_forbidden: Only the creator can edit the habit

modals.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?

settings.title: Settings
settings.share_profile_text: Check out my profile on Habitry!
settings.share_referral_text: Join me on Habitry and let's build habits together!
settings.referral_info_text: For every habit your referral completes, you'll receive 1 WILL token.
settings.username_required: Telegram username is required to share profile

alerts.wallet_not_connected: Wallet not connected. Please connect your wallet on the main screen.
alerts.insufficient_funds: Insufficient funds for withdrawal. Your balance: {balance} WILL
alerts.transaction_confirmed_message: {amount} WILL tokens have been added to your account
alerts.transaction_failed_message: Failed to process your transaction. Please try again.
alerts.usdt_transaction_failed_message: Failed to process your USDT transaction. Please try again.
alerts.habit_join_error: Failed to join the habit. Please try again later.
alerts.habit_create_error: Failed to create the habit. Please try again later.
alerts.ton_transaction_sent: Your transaction has been sent to the TON blockchain. Processing may take several minutes.

payment.success_message: Transaction completed successfully! Tokens will be added to your balance soon.
payment.enter_withdraw_amount: Enter amount of WILL to withdraw
payment.transaction_failed_message: Failed to process your transaction. Please try again.
payment.withdrawal_request_message: Your withdrawal request for {will_amount} WILL ({usdt_amount} USDT) has been submitted. Funds will be credited to your wallet within 24 hours.
payment.invalid_usdt_master_address: Invalid USDT master contract address. Please check the configuration.
payment.invalid_app_wallet_address: Invalid application wallet address. Please check the configuration.
payment.wallet_app_error: Error in wallet application. Please try using a different wallet or update the application.
payment.transaction_send_error: Error occurred while sending the transaction
payment.instructions_message: Want to learn how to buy cryptocurrency?
payment.ton_space_description: First, you need to create a crypto wallet in TON Space. It's free and takes just a few minutes.
payment.p2p_description: Now you can buy TON cryptocurrency on the P2P market in the Wallet bot.
payment.usdt_description: Final step - exchange TON for USDT in your TON Space wallet.

welcome.title: Welcome to Habitry!
welcome.description: We'll help you create and maintain good habits together with friends

social.title: Mutual Support
social.description: Share your habit with friends via link. When a friend links your habit to theirs, they'll see your progress. To see their progress, you'll need to link their habit to yours too

interaction.title: How to Mark Habits
interaction.description: To mark a habit as done, press and hold its card

start.title: Let's Start!
start.description: Create your first habit and invite friends to join you
